text:
If i place a large value (like 999999999999999) in the counter maximum value 
it does not increment. What is the maximum value that is allowed ? And would 
it be possible to have no maximum (as per the thread group which allows 
looping forever) ?
creator: nicholash@excite.com

text:
The counter value is treated as an "int", so the maximum value is 
Integer.MAX_VALUE = 2147483647.

Changing to "long" would allow much larger values to be used, but there would 
still be a maximum.

Changing to enhancement
